Package edu.columbia.stat.wood.sequencememoizer

Interface Summary
ByteSequenceMemoizerInterface  
DiscreteDistribution Interface for a discrete distribution.
SequenceMemoizer Discrete probabilistic sequence model based on hierarchical Pitman-Yor processes.
 

Class Summary
BaseSequenceMemoizer Basic implementation of some of the Sequence Memoizer methods.
BytePredictiveModel  
ByteRestaurant  
ByteSamplingNode  
ByteSequenceMemoizer  
ByteSequenceMemoizerParameters  
Discounts Discount parameter wrapper for sequence memoizer.
FiniteAlphabetBaseRestaurant Specialized restaurant for the very root of the tree.
FiniteAlphabetRestaurant Tree node object used in the Chinese restaurant representation for the Sequence Memoizer
FiniteAlphabetSequenceMemoizer Sequence memoizer model for finite alphabets.
FiniteAlphabetSequenceMemoizerParameters Extends SequenceMemoizerParameters to specify the base distribution as finite.
FiniteDiscreteDistribution A discrete distribution with a finite alphabet size.
FiniteDiscretePDFIterator Iterator object for the PDF of a finite discrete distribution.
IntegerPair Container object for two integers.
MutableDouble Container object for native double.
MutableInteger Container object for an integer.
OnlineRestaurant  
OnlineSequenceMemoizer A sequence memoizer object using a compressed respresentation and permitting a usage with a constant memory footprint.
Pair<F,S> Container object for two objects.
Range Container object for two doubles.
RangeAndDecode Container object to extend Range to also hold an integer.
Sequence Container object for an int[] containing the values of the sequence being memoized.
SequenceMemoizerParameters A container object for the parameters of a sequence memoizer.
UniformDiscreteDistribution Uniform distribution over finite alphabet size.
UniformFiniteDiscretePDFIterator An iterator object to iterate over the type probability pairs which define the PDF of a uniform finite discrete distribution.
